creditline: Gift of Mr.and Mrs. Augustus L. Searle
description: carved rhinoceros horn libation cup; in form of a conventional magnolia flower with long stem profusely decorated with plum, bamboo and pine trees in perforated work; the exterior of the cup is decorated in design of various fruits and flowers;  carved wood base
text: In the form of a magnolia flower with a long stem, showing stylized clouds below its lip, the cup is mounted in an elaborately carved wood base. A real showpiece!
title: Libation Cup with Base
